![Cardano Logo](/img/cardano-white.svg)

# Get started with the technical concepts

To get the most out of the Cardano Developer Portal, you should have programming experience and a basic understanding of blockchain concepts. This section provides comprehensive coverage of Cardano's technical foundations, organized into key areas for easier learning and reference.

## [Core Blockchain Fundamentals](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/core-blockchain-fundamentals)[​](#core-blockchain-fundamentals "Direct link to core-blockchain-fundamentals")

Learn the foundational concepts that power Cardano's blockchain technology:

**→ [Explore Core Blockchain Fundamentals](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/core-blockchain-fundamentals)**

## [Wallet & Key Management](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/wallet-key-management)[​](#wallet--key-management "Direct link to wallet--key-management")

Master the cryptographic foundations of wallet security:

**→ [Learn Wallet & Key Management](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/wallet-key-management)**

## [Assets](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/assets)[​](#assets "Direct link to assets")

Discover Cardano's native asset and smart contract capabilities:

**→ [Explore Assets](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/assets)**

## [Consensus & Staking](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/consensus-staking)[​](#consensus--staking "Direct link to consensus--staking")

Understand Cardano's proof-of-stake consensus mechanism:

**→ [Deep Dive into Consensus & Staking](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/consensus-staking)**

## [Network & Communication](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/network-communication)[​](#network--communication "Direct link to network--communication")

Learn how Cardano nodes communicate and share data:

**→ [Understand Network & Communication](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/network-communication)**

## [Governance & Standards](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/governance-standards)[​](#governance--standards "Direct link to governance--standards")

Participate in Cardano's governance and standards development:

**→ [Learn About Governance & Standards](/docs/get-started/technical-concepts/governance-standards)**
